greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways n can be written as the sum of squares of consecutive numbers (possibly including squares of negative numbers).
link: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
xref: If a(n) is zero then n is in A062863, otherwise in A062861. If a(n) is odd then n is in A006331.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 25 2001
